channel.title: Turning Into A Bird?
channel.description:
hehe *giigles*
right for my essay i must write out the possible ways of turning into a bird
so tell me ways, and be silly about it..i wanna fail as much as i can :P
but be funny at the same time ;) :| ;D :confused: :D :| :D

item.title: Turning Into A Bird?
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Actually, Salvia Divinorum or how ever it's spelled could give you a very indepth trip, you could possibly induce something about birds?

You might have a trip about flying/being a bird, but it would be nearly impossible to induce that. You can up some trips on Erowid. Some people use Salvia to heal their minds of trauma from the past with ancient rituals, you could try one of the rituals or use music in a dark room (Hole in My Shoe by Traffic is alot like flying).

Actually pot can make you hallucinate. You might be able to induce a flying trip with the Dream Machine.

Read full topic

Actually, Salvia Divinorum or how ever it’s spelled could give you a very indepth trip, you could possibly induce something about birds?

item.title: Turning Into A Bird?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Kmb:

I heard that if you catch the bird flue, you will turn into a bird.

I herd mudkipflu evolves into mudkips.

On the other hand how about a sick man some how has sex with a pidgeon (e.g. Mr Garrison from South Park) and then some how he gets pidgeon aids. Slowly every night when the moon comes out he turns into a bird and then shits on people in the street - even his own friends who he would never shit on in real life! Just like a werewolf would kill its best friend.

Read full topic

item.title: Turning Into A Bird?

item.description:

item.title: Turning Into A Bird?
item.dc:creator: @HoMM HoMM
item.description:
@HoMM wrote:

Actually to turn into a bird you just have to insert your brain into a bird (for some birds you will have to decrease your brain size) and mix your human and bird DNA together so that the brain would function with the bird. Easy!

Read full topic

item.title: Turning Into A Bird?
item.dc:creator: @redragonje65 redragonje65
item.description:
@redragonje65 wrote:

Ok… So you fall off this building and your skull cracks open and all of the blood and your brain starts oozing out of your head when suddenly a bird comes out of your pocket, it was eating the piece of bread you left in it from when you were eating toast this morning, and starts drinking some of your brain-blood juice while a dog attacks the bird and the bird starts bleeding and the blood mixes with your blood and brains and then the bird flys back into your pocket and you now have bird/human DNA but your still dead so Clair from Heroes comes and starts drinking your blood and brain juice but the dog attacks her and she bleeds a little but she heals and luckily some of the blood comes and mixes with your DNA which is now a Clair-bird-human DNA hybrid so you have Clair’s power to heal so you come back to life but your still human so you go and get a shot of Promicine (4400) and then you soon develop the ability to change forms and you test your ability and you turn into a bird so you fly around a little but then guy birds come and stick their dicks in your ass because when you took some of Clair’s DNA it mixed with the bird DNA and you became a girl bird with guys chasing you.

Read full topic
